Name: Magic Forms
About the game: Magic Forms is a entertaining simple casual puzzle game focused on forms and colors where the objective is complete all faces of the forms with a color selected by the player. Example: Cube, Pyramid, Rectangle, Hexagon, Trapezium, Octagon, etc. Can be played from kids to oldies.
